title: Backup and recovery of contacts in Phone Book
answer:
On the home screen, click Tools>![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110258)to back up and restore contacts. 

1Backup 

 On the home screen, click Tools >![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110259), and click New backup, check the data to be backed up, and click Backup. Set a password and click OK. 

2Recovery 

 On the home screen, click Tools >![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110260). In the backup file list, select the data file to be restored and click Restore. When Recovery is complete is displayed on the screen, click OK. 

 Before recovering contacts, make sure that you have backed up your contacts.
